alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Holt and Boyd Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lynch to 11 miles northeast of Atkinson. Movement was northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Butte, Lynch, Naper, Gross, Bristow, Dustin, Anoka, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Spencer Dam, Midway, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 193 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 91 and 137. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
